name: There's Only One Earth
description:
Created by Adam Gryu and Attila "Gabriel" Branyiczky for GMTK Jam 2019

Music by Mark Sparling

How To Play:

*2-4 PLAYERS; Connect up to 4 Controllers, or a Keyboard + 3 Controllers to play*

Be the last UFO standing. Throw the Earth at your opponents with your 2 charged attacks:
- A Button: Repulse; Knock the Earth away from you
- B Button: Attract; Pull the Earth towards you and spawn a Reflector at the moment you release the button. The reflector knocks the earth towards the nearest opponent.
- First to 5 Kills wins!
- Keyboard Controls: Z / X / Arrow Keys
